channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees) problem, 8th May
item.description:
Damaged leaning no parking at any time sign and signpost. Leaning but safe at time of inspection. Needs replacing.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees)

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 8th May
item.description:
28 day with 3 way stop and go best out of hours carriageway pothole 1000x600x40mm tarmac patch required unable to mark up or measure due to traffic. Size is approximate. (CW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 8th May
item.description:
28 day with give and take plus temporary footway closure footway edge deterioration 2700x400x20mm tarmac patch required (FW6 Edge Deterioration)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 8th May
item.description:
